prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a sleek, humanoid shape and glowing features.
Show me an alien Pokemon that has a futuristic design and vibrant colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that can manipulate space and has elongated limbs and a unique color palette.
Generate a mythical creature with a mysterious aura, showcasing its psychic abilities.
Make a Pokemon that is part of a space-themed collection, featuring bold colors and abstract shapes.
Design a powerful psychic Pokemon with a unique body structure and eye-catching color combinations.
Give me a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of the cosmos with striking visuals.
